sentences.sContent: Suppose the width of a rectangle is x metres.
sentences.sContent_eng: Suppose the width of a rectangle is x metres.
sentences.sCn: 设长方形的宽是 x 米。

remMethod.val: rect(直的) + angl(角) + e → 四个角都为直角 → 长方形

trans.tranOther: a shape that has four straight sides, two of which are usually longer than the other two, and four 90˚ angles at the corners
